metadata.title: CVE-2013-7110 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: Transifex command-line client before 0.10 does not validate X.509 certificates for data transfer connections, which allows man-in-the-middle attackers to spoof a Transifex server via an arbitrary certificate.  NOTE: this vulnerability exists because of an incomplete fix for CVE-2013-2073.

notes.note: mdeslaur> fix for CVE-2013-2073 was incomplete

criterions.comment: transifex-client package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
